name: Satin Sweets
description:
Control
Left click on stuff to move right click on workstations to craft, recipes are in the note at the bottom of the screen stuff u need to make is on the right.

You can queue commands so you don't need to wait for your dude to finish with his task.

Story (that once again didn't make it)
Satin has a devilish plan to take over the sweets industry and overtake Jammy industries, it is up to you proud Satin employee to serve as many guests as possible and ensure his plan succeeds.

Which it doesn't.

Note
If it's broken I'm sorry I lost a day so I fell behind, but if its not broken and if you enjoyed my garbage you can leave a hot follow.
If you want the source code it's available too I used 2-d extras but that's available on GitHub by unity anything else used I made but that's hot garbage.

Extras,
Made for Minijam 66
I wanted to make a web build but it was like 1 am and it crashed 3 times so no sorry.
Satin will return, probably...
